name: ListItemActionComponent

inputsClass.name: disabled
inputsClass.rawdescription: Defines if the action is disabled or not.
inputsClass.description: Defines if the action is disabled or not.

inputsClass.name: icon
inputsClass.rawdescription: The name of the icon to use.
inputsClass.description: The name of the icon to use.

inputsClass.name: label
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The label to display (you can alternatively use
content projection to display the label).
inputsClass.description: The label to display (you can alternatively use content projection to display the label).

outputsClass.name: click
outputsClass.rawdescription:
An EventEmitter to determine what to do if the
action is triggered.
outputsClass.description: An EventEmitter to determine what to do if the action is triggered.

propertiesClass.name: productExperienceEvent
propertiesClass.description: The product experience event to be triggered when the action is clicked.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
The product experience event to be triggered
when the action is clicked.

description:
Actions are functions that can be executed on the current list item. They are displayed next to the item and can be grouped in a dropdown.

Example :
<c8y-li>
  <c8y-li-action (click)="deleteDevice(device.id)" icon="times">
    Delete
  </c8y-li-action>
  <c8y-li-action (click)="(false)" icon="rocket">
    Launch to space
  </c8y-li-action>
</c8y-li>
rawdescription:
Actions are functions that can be executed on the
current list item. They are displayed next to the
item and can be grouped in a dropdown.

```html
<c8y-li>
  <c8y-li-action (click)="deleteDevice(device.id)" icon="times">
    Delete
  </c8y-li-action>
  <c8y-li-action (click)="(false)" icon="rocket">
    Launch to space
  </c8y-li-action>
</c8y-li>
```
